channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sister of Haverhill officer who died suddenly calls for transparency amid department controversies
FT Live: Anglo American CEO reaffirms merger as Teck slashes forecasts
Oshkosh council member resigns as city prepares to explore purchase of City Center
At a key moment in talks that led to the Gaza ceasefire deal, Trump refused to take no for an answer
ESPN's Ryan Clark, Scott Van Pelt apologize for 'SportsCenter' comments about Kyren Lacy's alleged role in fatal car crash
Illinois urges judge to stop National Guard deployment after Trump administration ‘plowed ahead’
item.description: The state of Illinois is urging a judge to order the National Guard to stand down in the Chicago area.

item.title: Former NBA star Paul Pierce arrested for alleged DUI on 101 Freeway in Los Angeles
item.description: Pierce, who played for the Clippers from 2015 to 2017, was arrested on the 101 Freeway after he was found asleep behind the wheel of his Range Rover o...

item.title: Judge dismisses Drake's lawsuit against UMG over Kendrick Lamar diss track
item.description: Kendrick Lamar and Drake have been beefing for years, with the two rappers releasing several diss tracks about one another.

item.title: WATCH: Speaker Johnson has emotional exchange with a military mom about shutdown
item.description: A military mom confronted House Speaker Johnson on C-SPAN over the lack of a standalone bill to pay troops if the government shutdown extends beyond O...

item.title: New York AG Letitia James indicted for alleged fraud following pressure from Trump
item.description: New York Attorney General Letitia James has been indicted on at least one count of alleged fraud following pressure from President Donald Trump.

item.title: Tropical storm Priscilla could bring flash flooding to U.S. Southwest
item.description: Tropical Storm Priscilla has been losing punch but could still bring flash flooding to the southwestern U.S. in coming days, forecasters say.

item.title: WATCH: Crypto scam almost costs woman her life savings
item.description: The FBI says scams perpetrated using bitcoin ATMs cost Americans nearly $250 million in 2024, more than double the sum from the previous year.

item.title: Trump touts 'momentous breakthrough' on Israel-Hamas ceasefire deal
item.description: President Trump took a victory lap on Israel and Hamas agreeing to implement the first phase of his 20-point peace plan, but questions remain about wh...

item.title: What to know about Texas court’s decision to pause Roberson’s execution in shaken baby case
Judge orders suspect in deadly LA wildfire to remain jailed, citing mental health concerns
10/9: CBS Morning News
item.description: Israel and Hamas agree to first phase of Gaza peace plan; South American orchestra group performs in California with instruments made from trash.

item.title: WATCH: President Trump signs proclamation protecting Columbus Day name
item.description: President Trump signed a proclamation protecting the name Columbus Day before hosting a Cabinet meeting on Thursday.

item.title: New York AG Letitia James indicted in Virginia
item.description: A federal grand jury has indicted New York Attorney General Letitia James, marking the second Trump foe to face federal prosecution in recent weeks.
